WorkItem.ClosedComment: The patch fix for this was applied
WorkItem.Description: Warrior T8 Bonuses are not currently implemented in the DPSWarr module.

Comments.Message: This is the next thing I am going to try to tackle, hopefully I should be able to upload a patch by the end of the weekend.

Patch ID 3013 submitted to add T8 set bonuses

1) Added 2 piece T8 proc based on this: http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=64938
   This proc is modeled on an estimate of HS and Slam crits, based on the origional function GetLandedAtksPerSecNoSS()
2) added 4 piece T8 bonus based on this: http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=64939
   This effect is modeled as an increase to crit probability for Bloodthirst and Mortal Strike

The set bonuses increase of DPS are on the same order as the bonuses in the Landsoul spreadsheet. The 2 piece bonus is just an estimate, a more accurate model could be developed as part of the rotation re-coding effort. The 4 piece bonus is accurately modeled.
